Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 19th overall pick, by West Texas in 1983...
Had first career hit on 7/18/1984, off Jeffrey Poon (SYR)...
Injured on 9/3/1984 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 2-3 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 4/13/1986, off Henry Yokley (PIL)...
Signed as a free agent by Penn on 2/20/1991 to a 3-year deal worth $1,000,000 per year...
